input: If there is dispute between Panchayat and Cantonment Board, who will decide finally?

options.A: Collector, subject to approval of Divisional commissioner
options.B: Divisional Commissioner, subject to approval of Panchayat and Rural Development Department
options.C: Panchayat and Rural Development Department, Subject to approval of State Government
options.D: State Government, Subject to approval of central Government

explanation: State Government, subject to approval of Central Government can decide the dispute between Panchayat and Cantonment Board.
